tool_description: Quickly translate any text using Google Translate
name: Quick Translate
title: Quick Translate

api_list.name: Translate (Return the single result)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quick-translate.p.rapidapi.com/translate-single"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quick-translate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
